meanings.definition: The act of participating in the sport of windsurfing.
meanings.sent1: Windsurfings can be thrilling on a windy day.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy watching windsurfings at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The windsurfings at the lake always draw a crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like the windsurfings, gracefully moving with the wind.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sails of the windsurfings brightened the water.

meanings.sent1: We saw many windsurfings at the competition.
meanings.sent2: The beach was filled with windsurfings of different sizes.
meanings.sent3: The windsurfings in the store window caught my eye.
meanings.sent4: The windsurfings on the horizon looked like colorful butterflies.
meanings.sent5: The windsurfings in the bay created a beautiful sight.
